com.nandox.jop.core.processor

Class PageApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nandox.jop.core.processor.PageApp

  • public class PageApp
extends java.lang.Object
    Class of Page application.

    One page application is composite by PageBlock, every block can contains PageExpression

    Author:
    Fernando Costantino
